<image_start>[reasoning_image_1]<image_end>
THOUGHT 2: Now, I will place the pieces from Option A into the missing areas to see if they fit seamlessly.
<image_start>[reasoning_image_2]<image_end>

THOUGHT 4: Next, I will test Option B by inserting its pieces into the holes.
<image_start>[reasoning_image_3]<image_end>
THOUGHT 5: After placing Option B's pieces, it is clear they do not match the texture or shape of the missing areas.
THOUGHT 6: Now I will test Option C by placing its pieces into the holes.
<image_start>[reasoning_image_4]<image_end>
THOUGHT 7: The pieces from Option C also do not fit correctly, showing misalignment and incorrect textures.
THOUGHT 8: Based on the visual testing, only Option A successfully fills the missing areas without any gaps or inconsistencies.

A
